entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Wingham
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:47 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 4:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: SSE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Risk of snow squalls before morning. Local blowing snow before morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
